rsgauges.config.title: 紅石測量與開關 設定
rsgauges.switch.feature.pulseextend.help: Activate while already active to extend the pulse time.
rsgauges.switch.feature.pulsetime.help: Left-click with a stack of redstone to set a fixed pulse time between 0.1s (1) and 6.4s (64).
rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.hel: Click with a Redstone Torch to configure the output (cycles through the options that this switch supports).
rsgauges.switch.feature.colortinting.hel: Left-click with any dye to color tint the switch.
rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help: Click with an Ender pearl to get a Switch Link Pearl linked to this switch.
rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help: Click with a Switch Link Pearl to use this switch as link source.
rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offde: Left-click with a stack of redstone to set the hold-time between 0.1s (1) and 6.4s (64).
rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.touch: Click on the touch config up/down buttons to set output power, entity filter, entity count, and sensitivity.
rsgauges.switch.feature.typebistable.hel:
§6A switch that is manually flipped on or off like a lever.
§r
rsgauges.switch.feature.typepulse.help:
§6A switch that outputs a redstone signal for a short time, like a button.
§r
rsgauges.sensitive_glass_block.colored.h: §6Glass block that changes from transparent to colored when it is powered by a redstone signal.§r A faint dashed framing indicates the color in unpowered state.
目標開關已被破環或變更位置
rsgauges.switchlinking.target_assign.err: 這個開關不能作為連接目標
rsgauges.switchlinking.source_assign.err: 這個開關不能連接至目標開關

目標對於這個開關來說過於遙遠
連接珍珠不喜歡這個開關
rsgauges.switchlinking.relayconfig.confv: 啟動狀態與起始開關同步。
在起始開關打開時觸發。
在起始開關關閉時觸發。
在起始開關狀態改變時觸發。
啟動狀態與起始開關的反相同步。
block.rsgauges.door_sensor_switch.help: §6A player detector that is mounted on walls above doors.§r
block.rsgauges.industrial_analog_angular: 紅石測量儀 (大型模擬電壓表)

§6A display device that can be attached to a solid block to visualise the redstone power of that block.§r
If the block can provide power itself, the gauge uses the output of it, otherwise the gauge will indirectly measure the power that the block receives from adjacent blocks. Strong and weak power is supported. Indirect weak measurements may have a short latency.
block.rsgauges.industrial_vertical_bar_g: 紅石測量儀 (大型模擬條)
block.rsgauges.industrial_small_digital_: 紅石測量儀 (小型數字顯示)
block.rsgauges.industrial_analog_horizon: 紅石測量儀 (小型模擬電壓表)
block.rsgauges.rustic_circular_gauge: 紅石測量儀 (鄉村式圓形牆掛表)
block.rsgauges.industrial_white_led: 紅石指示器 (小型方形白燈)
block.rsgauges.industrial_white_led.help:
§6A small device that can be attached to a block to indicate if that block is powered.§r
If the block can provide power itself, it uses the output of the block, otherwise it looks up the power that the block receives from adjacent blocks.
Left click with dye to change the LED color.
block.rsgauges.industrial_white_blinking: 紅石指示器 (閃爍小型方形白燈)
${block.rsgauges.industrial_white_led.help} Blinks with a frequency of about 0.5Hz.

block.rsgauges.industrial_alarm_lamp: 紅石指示器 (紅色警示燈)
block.rsgauges.industrial_alarm_lamp.hel: §6A red lamp that blinks when detecting a redstone signal from the block it is attached to.§r Emits light when active.
block.rsgauges.industrial_green_blinking: 紅石指示器 (閃爍小型方形綠燈)
${block.rsgauges.industrial_white_led.help} Blinks with a frequency of about 0.5Hz.
block.rsgauges.industrial_yellow_blinkin: 紅石指示器 (閃爍小型方形黃燈)
${block.rsgauges.industrial_white_led.help} Blinks with a frequency of about 0.5Hz.
block.rsgauges.industrial_red_blinking_l: 紅石指示器 (閃爍小型方形紅燈)
${block.rsgauges.industrial_white_led.help} Blinks with a frequency of about 0.5Hz.
block.rsgauges.industrial_alarm_siren: 紅石聲音指示器 (警報器)
block.rsgauges.industrial_alarm_siren.he: §6A siren that frequently emits an alarm sound when detecting a redstone signal from the block it is attached to.
block.rsgauges.rustic_semaphore: 紅石指示器 (小型鄉村式旗語)
block.rsgauges.rustic_semaphore.help:
§6A small metal case with a semaphore flag, which raises when the block to that the indicator is attached to is powered.§r
If the block can provide power itself, it uses the output of the block, otherwise it looks up the power that the block receives from adjacent blocks.
Left click with dye to tint the flag.

block.rsgauges.industrial_door_contact_m: 接觸紅石開關 (門接觸墊)

§6An industrial floor contact mat that emits a redstone signal when exposed to mechanical pressure on the top (e.g. someone standing on it), and a short time after the pressure was released.§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.touch.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_contact_mat: 接觸紅石開關 (靈敏方形接觸墊)
block.rsgauges.industrial_contact_mat.he:
§6An industrial floor contact mat that emits a redstone signal when exposed to mechanical pressure on the top side (e.g. someone standing on it), and a short time after the pressure was released.§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_shock_sensitiv: 接觸紅石開關 (衝擊感應接觸墊)

§6An industrial contact mat emitting a redstone pulse when exposed to mechanical shock from above (e.g. something falls on it).§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. Power is always 15. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.rustic_door_contact_plate: 接觸紅石開關 (鄉村式門底板)

§6A metal plate that emits a redstone signal when exposed to mechanical pressure from above (e.g. someone standing on it), and a short time after the pressure was released.§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.touch.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.rustic_contact_plate: 接觸紅石開關 (鄉村式壓力板)
block.rsgauges.rustic_contact_plate.help:
§6A metal plate that emits a redstone signal when exposed to mechanical pressure from above (e.g. someone standing on it), and a short time after the pressure was released.§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.rustic_shock_sensitive_pl: 接觸紅石開關 (鄉村式衝擊感應接觸墊)

§6A metal plate emitting a redstone pulse when exposed to mechanical shock from above (e.g. something falls on it).§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. Power is always 15. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.glass_door_contact_mat: 接觸紅石開關 (觸摸屏可配置玻璃片)
block.rsgauges.glass_door_contact_mat.he:
§6A glass floor plate that changes color and emits a redstone signal when exposed to mechanical pressure on the top (e.g. someone standing on it), and a short time after the pressure was released.§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. Does not emit any sounds. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.touch.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.colortinting.help}
block.rsgauges.glass_contact_mat.help:
§6A glass floor plate that changes color and emits a redstone signal when exposed to mechanical pressure on the top (e.g. someone standing on it), and a short time after the pressure was released.§r
Outputs are to the front and bottom. Does not emit any sounds. Sensors are high sensitive. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.colortinting.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_shock_sensitiv: 地板門開關 (工業式衝擊啟動地板門)

§6An industrial floor trap door that swings open and emits a redstone signal when someone or something falls on it.§r
Output is to the block it is mounted on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_high_sensitive: 地板門開關 (工業式衝擊啟動靈敏地板門)

§6An industrial floor trap door that swings open and emits a redstone signal when someone or something falls on it, or when someone walks on it without sneaking.§r
Output is to the block it is mounted on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_fallthrough_de: 地板門開關 (工業式物品地板門)

§6An industrial sensor frame that emits a redstone signal when something falls through it.§r
Output is to the block it is mounted on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.rustic_shock_sensitive_tr: 地板門開關 (鄉村式衝擊啟動地板門)

§6A metal floor trap door that swings open and emits a redstone signal when someone or something falls on it.§r
Output is to the block it is mounted on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.rustic_high_sensitive_tra: 地板門開關 (鄉村式衝擊啟動靈敏地板門)

§6Metal floor trap door that swings open and emits a redstone signal when someone or something falls on it, or when someone walks on it without sneaking.§r
Output is to the block it is mounted on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.rustic_fallthrough_detect: 地板門開關 (鄉村式物品地板門)

§6A metal trap door that swings open emits a redstone signal when something touches it.§r
Output is to the block it is mounted on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_entity_detecto: 自動紅石開關 (紅外運動探測器)

§6A small device that observes a defined volume and emits a redstone signal if it sees an entity.§r
The volume is two blocks above and below, and 'range' in front, left and right (covers 180 degrees). The range can be configured with small buttons on the front face, together with the output strength, the number of entities seen, and the entity type seen (mobs, players, animals, etc). Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_linear_entity_: 自動紅石開關 (線性雷射探測器)

§6A small device that observes in one direction and emits a redstone signal if it senses an entity.§r
The observed volume is 'range' blocks in front, and half a block to the sides. The range can be configured with small buttons on the front face, together with the output strength, the number of entities seen, and the entity type seen (mobs, players, animals, etc). Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_light_sensor: 自動紅石開關 (局部光感器)
block.rsgauges.industrial_light_sensor.h:
§6A small device that measures the local light level at its location and emits a redstone signal depending on on-threshold and off-threshold set with small buttons on the front face.§r
These buttons also allow to set output power and debouncing. Debouncing delays switching off or on until the light level is stable, higher values means better noise filtering, but also more switching delay. If on and off settings are identical, then the measured light level must exactly match the set value. Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_day_timer: 自動紅石開關 (日間計時器)
block.rsgauges.industrial_day_timer.help:
§6A small device that emits a redstone signal from a configured start (day) time to a configured end time.§r
The time span is set with buttons on the device front face (24 hour format, where 06:00 is sunrise). These buttons also allow to set output power and a randomising value. Latter means delaying to switch on or off for a random time span, where higher values cause longer delays. Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_rain_sensor: 自動紅石開關 (雨水感應開關)
block.rsgauges.industrial_rain_sensor.he:
§6A small wall mounted device that emits a redstone signal when it rains on it.§r
The buttons on the front facing allow to configure the output signal strength. Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_lightning_sens: 自動紅石開關 (雷電預測開關)

§6A small wall mounted device that emits a redstone signal when it senses a high electric potential in the air, i.e. in thunder storms.§r
The buttons on the front facing allow to configure the output signal strength. Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_interval_timer: 自動紅石開關 (間隔信號計時器)

§6A small device that emits a rectangular redstone signal with a defined on- and off- time.§r
Timing is configured using buttons on the front facing, and can be set between 0.1s (2 ticks) and 600s (10min). The step size adapts to the current values (small steps for small values, big steps for big values). The config buttons also enable you to define the output signal strength and a ramp value, which will make the timer ramping up and down the redstone signal when switching. §eThe timer is placed in standby mode for setup. Click on the front face to set it into run mode.§r Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} As Switch Link target the timer toggles between run and standby mode.
block.rsgauges.industrial_comparator_swi: 自動紅石開關（工業比較器開關）

§6A small device that that emits a redstone signal depending on the comparator output level or inventory statistics of the block it is attached to.§r
The buttons on the front facing allow to configure the output signal strength, switch-on comparator value, switch-off comparator value, and operating mode ("comparator, free slots, used slots, ..."). ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.glass_entity_detector: 自動紅石開關 (玻璃紅外運動探測器)
block.rsgauges.glass_entity_detector.hel:
§6A small glass device that observes a defined volume and emits a redstone signal if it sees an entity.§r
The volume is two blocks above and below, and 'range' in front, left and right (covers 180 degrees). The range can be configured with small buttons on the front face, together with the output strength, the number of entities seen, and the entity type seen (mobs, players, animals, etc). Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. Does not emit switching sounds. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.glass_linear_entity_detec: 自動紅石開關 (玻璃線性雷射探測器)

§6A small glass device that observes in one direction and emits a redstone signal if it senses an entity.§r
The observed volume is 'range' blocks in front, and half a block to the sides. The range can be configured with small buttons on the front face, together with the output strength, the number of entities seen, and the entity type seen (mobs, players, animals, etc). Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. Does not emit switching sounds. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.glass_day_timer: 自動紅石開關 (玻璃日間計時器)
block.rsgauges.glass_day_timer.help:
§6A small glass device that emits a redstone signal from a configured start (day) time to a configured end time.§r
The time span is set with buttons on the device front face (24 hour format, where 06:00 is sunrise). These buttons also allow to set output power and a randomising value. Latter means delaying to switch on or off for a random time span, where higher values cause longer delays. Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. Does not emit switching sounds. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.glass_interval_timer: 自動紅石開關 (玻璃間隔信號計時器)
block.rsgauges.glass_interval_timer.help:
§6A small device that emits a rectangular redstone signal with a defined on- and off- time.§r
Timing is configured using buttons on the front facing, and can be set between 0.1s (2 ticks) and 600s (10min). The step size adapts to the current values (small steps for small values, big steps for big values). The config buttons also enable you to define the output signal strength and a ramp value, which will make the timer ramping up and down the redstone signal when switching. §eThe timer is placed in standby mode for setup. Click on the front face to set it into run mode.§r Output is to the block where the sensor is placed on. Does not emit switching sounds. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} As Switch Link target the timer toggles between run and standby mode.
block.rsgauges.industrial_block_detector: 方塊檢測開關 (工業系列)
block.rsgauges.industrial_dimmer.help:
§6An industrial manual redstone power dimmer.§r
Allows to manually set an output signal between 0 and 15 at the back side of the device. The vertical click position defines the signal strength. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_switchlink_rec: 開關連接接收器 (工業式)

§6A small industrial bistable switching device that is optimised to be used as a Switch Link target.§r
The relay inside is muffled and therefore very silent. Can also be manually activated like a lever. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_switchlink_cas: 方塊型開關連接接收器 (工業式)

§6A full block cased industrial bistable switching device that is optimised to be used as a Switch Link target.§r
The relay inside is muffled and therefore very silent. Can also be manually activated like a lever. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_switchlink_pul: 開關連接脈衝接收器 (工業式)

§6A small industrial pulse switching device that is optimised to be used as a Switch Link target.§r
Like a normal pulse switch it activates for a short time when manually clicked or triggered by a switch link. The relay inside is muffled and therefore very silent. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.pulsetime.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_switchlink_cas: 方塊型開關連接脈衝接收器 (工業式)

§6A full block industrial pulse switching device that is optimised to be used as a Switch Link target.§r
Like a normal pulse switch it activates for a short time when manually clicked or triggered by a switch link. The relay inside is muffled and therefore very silent. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.pulsetime.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_switchlink_rel:
§6A small industrial switching device that is optimised to be used as a Switch Link relay with redstone input.§r
The relay cannot emit redstone signals, instead it allows Link Pearls inside to trigger when the redstone power of the block it is mounted on changes. By double-left clicking empty handed you can change the input polarity (inverted means active-low) and strength sensitivity (default weak, strong means that strong power is needed to trigger the links). Muffled, therefore very silent. Can also be manually activated like a lever for testing. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_switchlink_pul:
§6A small industrial pulse switching device that is optimised to be used as a Switch Link relay with redstone input.§r
The pulse relay cannot emit redstone signals, instead it allows Link Pearls inside to trigger when the redstone power of the block it is mounted on changes. It activates for a short time when the redstone input changes from 0 to any higher value. By double-left clicking empty handed you can change the input polarity (inverted means active-low) and strength sensitivity (default weak, strong means that strong power is needed to trigger the links). Muffled, therefore very silent. Can also be manually activated like a pulse switch for testing. ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.yellow_power_plant.help:
§6Artificial yellow flower that looks very similar to dandelion, emitting a redstone signal to the front and bottom when something touches it (like a contact plate).§r
${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.red_power_plant.help:
§6Artificial yellow flower that looks very similar to a poppy, emitting a redstone signal to the front and bottom when something touches it (like a contact plate).§r
${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.contactmat.offdelay.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_knock_button: 敲擊檢測脈衝開關 (工業式)
block.rsgauges.industrial_knock_button.h: §6Emits a redstone pulse when the adjacent block of its facing is clicked.§r ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.pulseextend.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.pulsetime.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.industrial_knock_switch: 敲擊檢測雙穩態開關 (工業式)
block.rsgauges.industrial_knock_switch.h: §6Switches on/off when the adjacent block of its facing is clicked.§r ${rsgauges.switch.feature.outputconfig.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linktarget.help} ${rsgauges.switch.feature.linksource.help}
block.rsgauges.sensitive_glass_block.hel: §6Glass block that emits light when it is powered by a redstone signal, similar to a redstone lamp.
block.rsgauges.inverted_sensitiveglass.h: §6Glass block that normally emits light like a redstone lamp, and switches off when it is powered by a redstone signal.§r
block.rsgauges.qube.help: It's a developer block that is not supposed to be craftable or used in the game.
item.rsgauges.switchlink_pearl.help:
§6Created by left clicking a switch with an Ender pearl. Remote activates that (target) switch when used or plugged into another (source) switch, also by left clicking.§r
Change link options by left clicking the target with the Switch Link Pearl (cycles through link options). You can plug more than one pearl into a switch. Pearls will complain when they are overstressed or cannot find their target, you can hear that. If a switch is not suitable to be a source or target for linking, the pearl will also complain. Different switch types may differ in their reaction to link triggers (simply experiment a bit).
